price: Yεka kyerεε no sε: ”Wura Soro Aheman no mu. (Habiib) kaa sε: “Sε anka me nkorͻfoͻ no nim-
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
